metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5361 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: Request Tracker (RT) 4.x before 4.0.25, 4.2.x before 4.2.14, and 4.4.x before 4.4.2 does not use a constant-time comparison algorithm for secrets, which makes it easier for remote attackers to obtain sensitive user password information via a timing side-channel attack.

criterions.comment: request-tracker4 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.1-4').
